title: Emerald and Diamond Nakshi Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: South Sea Pearls (40.10 carats for necklace and 14.75 for locket)
features: Intricate Nakshi work featuring traditional floral motifs is combined with modern diamond setting techniques. The pendant showcases a prominent emerald center stone surrounded by a halo of diamonds, with delicate pearl drops. The necklace’s design includes emeralds strategically placed to enhance the overall aesthetic. The locket also incorporates emerald with pearls. The setting style ensures maximum brilliance and durability.
colors: and Lustrous Cream Pearls create a classic and harmonious color palette.
occasions: or any grand celebration where a touch of timeless elegance is desired. Suitable for formal events and can also be styled for modern gatherings.
description: This Haaram is a beautiful blend of traditional Telugu craftsmanship and modern jewelry design. The use of high-quality diamonds, rubies, emeralds, and South Sea pearls, combined with intricate Nakshi work, makes this piece a true heirloom. It embodies cultural richness while retaining a contemporary appeal. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability.
